transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Ji good afternoon sir, Vineet baat kar raha hu IndiaMART head office se.
Customer: Ji boliye sir.
Executive: Kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Bas badhiya sir.
Executive: Sir aapki na Shubham se baat hui thi abhi aaj morning mein.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Toh aapke paas ek feedback mail aaya hoga Shubham ke liye ki unse aapka discussion hua hai toh usme aapne not satisfied mark kiya hua hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh isiliye maine call kiya, main unka manager baat kar raha hu ki sir aisa kya discussion ho gaya ki aapne not satisfied diya hua hai.
Customer: Abhi kar lenge wohi aage decision bhi karna hai, aisi koi baat nahi hai, kaam karna hai toh.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Main yeh keh raha hu kaam karna decision bhi karna padega.
Executive: Nahi nahi main filhaal aapse baat kar raha hu uss cheez ke liye aapne jo feedback diya hai na aapke WhatsApp pe aaya hoga ki Shubham se aapki baat hui hai toh aap discussion se jo uss baat se satisfied hai ki not satisfied hai toh aapne uss discussion ko not satisfied kiya hai. Jaha tak mere ko pata hai aap logo ka renewal ka discussion hua tha.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Toh usme se koi aisa discussion hua jisme aapne not satisfied aapko laga ho.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Toh isiliye maine call kiya.
Customer: Ha acha acha acha, ha acha acha acha.
Executive: Ji toh wohi main jaanna chahta tha.
Customer: Ha usme ha ha usme woh ho gaya.
Executive: Acha galti se ho gaya kya sir aapke keh rahe hai?
Customer: Ha ji ji ji ji.
Executive: Sir actually woh na inki rating hoti hai jaise hamare yaha pe aapko koi call karta hai toh na.
Customer: Ha ha ha woh aage mere ko mail. Ha woh lag gaya hoga woh.
Executive: Ha sir toh unka woh kharab ho jati hai rating uski wajah se.
Customer: Nahi nahi sir agar aage woh galti se.
Executive: Nahi sir woh galti se lag gaye honge.
Customer: Ji sir agar aap bhi kabhi aage aaye toh please usko satisfied mark kar dijiyega. Till then aapka ek ticket open hua hai woh main band kar raha hu aur sir yeh bhi jaanna chah raha hu Shubham mujhe yeh bhi bata raha tha ki aap kuch price ko leke kuch problem aa rahi thi. Aap ek deal bol rahe hai.
Executive: Kya problem aa rahi thi aap mujhe bataiye.
Customer: Ab problem kya hai main aapse phir baad mein thoda baat karu mere paas mein do bande baithe hai.
Executive: Sahi hai koi baat nahi sir main abhi aapka ticket close kar raha hu ticket close karne ke baad na aapke mail pe ek feedback aayega usko sir satisfied mark kijiyega yes, thik hai?
Customer: Okay okay sir.
Executive: Thik hai sir phir main aapko ek baar kal nahi toh parso ek baar call lagaunga iske regarding ki jo aapka discussion hua tha, thik hai?
Customer: Okay sir okay sir, nahi woh lag jao lag woh toh ho jati hai sir.
Executive: Ji ji koi nahi main abhi band karunga toh sir abhi satisfied mark kijiyega mail pe aayega aapko.
Customer: Okay sir.
Executive: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' in feedback mail.

- Customer mentioned a price-related problem.



Resolution:

- Customer said the 'not satisfied' mark was a mistake.

- Executive closed the ticket.

- Executive will call back regarding price issue.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to mark 'satisfied' on feedback mail.

- Executive to call back in 1-2 days.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, rating, satisfied, price, ticket
